Class LockedInventory

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class LockedInventory
extends Inventory
    Inventory for player where every slot can be only of a certain kind.

      • tryReplace

        public Item tryReplace(Item item,
              int slot)
        Tries replacing an item in a certain slot. If the item is compatible it swaps.
        Parameters:
        item - New item
        slot - Inventory slot
        Returns:
        Old item, if swap is successful, or null if swap is impossible.
